ChunkText: the education abroad office helps umbc students find a summer, winter, semester or academic year study abroad program that will enable them earn credits toward their umbc degree while having a life-changing experience in one of dozens of countries around the world.
ContextBefore: the office offers a variety of programming and services to assist students and scholars in pursuit of their academic, personal, and professional goals.
ContextAfter: the fulbright program is the flagship international educational exchange program sponsored by the u.s. government and is designed to build lasting connections between the people of the united states and the people of other countries.
